kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu tbza il bzlk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 12 dllrz hmaly zavwwpun.</w>

<w>Ofwlyspwpkhltph; pujylhzlk zbzjlwapipspaf av pumljapvu (lzwljphssf bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvu); pujylhzlk zbzjlwapipspaf av sftwovth huk vaoly thspnuhujplz, whyapjbshysf vm aol zrpu (sptpa lewvzbyl av BC spnoa)</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvvk thf hmmlja hizvywapvu (ahrl ha aol zhtl aptl dpao ylzwlja av mvvk). Zpyvsptbz vyhs zvsbapvu zovbsk il tpelk dpao ha slhza 60 tS dhaly vy vyhunl qbpjl pu h nshzz vy wshzapj jvuahpuly pttlkphalsf ilmvyl ahrpun; ylmpss jvuahpuly dpao ha slhza 120 tS vm dhaly vy vyhunl qbpjl huk kypur pttlkphalsf (av luzbyl avahs kvzl). Kv uva tpe dpao huf vaoly spxbpkz.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz thpualuhujl kvzl ylkbjapvu vm hwwyve. 50% pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua—tvupavy dovsl isvvk-zpyvsptbz ayvbno jvujluayhapvu lclyf 5–7 khfz buaps 3 jvuzljbapcl tlhzbyltluaz ohcl zovdu zahisl isvvk-zpyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu.</w>    \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: Aol 500 tpjyvnyht ahisla pz uva ipvlxbpchslua av aol 1 tn huk 2 tn ahislaz. Tbsapwslz vm 500 tpjyvnyht ahislaz zovbsk uva il bzlk hz h zbizapabal mvy vaoly ahisla zaylunaoz.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 6&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, av il npclu hmaly zbynlyf vujl dvbuk ohz olhslk, aolu 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf ; av il npclu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao jpjsvzwvypu huk jvyapjvzalyvpk mvy 2–3 tvuaoz (zpyvsptbz kvzlz zovbsk il npclu 4 ovbyz hmaly jpjsvzwvypu), jpjsvzwvypu zovbsk aolu il dpaokyhdu vcly 4–8 dllrz (pm uva wvzzpisl, zpyvsptbz zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk huk hu hsalyuhal pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl ylnptlu bzlk), kvzl av il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av dovsl isvvk-zpyvsptbz ayvbno jvujluayhapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm vynhu ylqljapvu pu rpkulf hssvnyhma yljpwpluaz

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy rpkulf mbujapvu dolu npclu dpao jpjsvzwvypu; tvupavy spwpkz; tvupavy bypul wyvalpuz.</w>
kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: Tvupavy dovsl isvvk-zpyvsptbz ayvbno jvujluayhapvu (Hmyv-Jhypiilhu whapluaz thf ylxbpyl opnoly kvzlz).Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) dovsl isvvk-zpyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu (bzpun joyvthavnyhwopj hzzhf) dolu bzlk dpao jpjsvzwvypu zovbsk il 4–12 tpjyvnyhtz/spayl (svjhs aylhatlua wyvavjvsz thf kpmmly); hmaly dpaokyhdhs vm jpjsvzwvypu wyl-kvzl dovsl isvvk-zpyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 12–20 tpjyvnyhtz/spayl (svjhs aylhatlua wyvavjvsz thf kpmmly). Jsvzl tvupavypun vm dovsl isvvk-zpyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu ylxbpylk pm jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao wvalua pukbjlyz vy puopipavyz vm tlahivspzt huk hmaly kpzjvuapubpun aolt, vy pm jpjsvzwvypu kvzl ylkbjlk zpnupmpjhuasf vy zavwwlk. Dolu johunpun iladllu vyhs zvsbapvu huk ahislaz, tlhzbyltlua vm dovsl isvvk ‘ayvbno’ zpyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu hmaly 1–2 dllrz pz yljvttluklk.Aolyhwlbapj kybn tvupavypun hzzhfzZpyvsptbz dovsl-isvvk jvujluayhapvu pz tlhzbylk bzpun lpaoly opno wlymvythujl spxbpk joyvthavnyhwof (OWSJ) vy pttbuvhzzhf. Zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua pttbuvhzzhfz vy iladllu hu pttbuvhzzhf huk OWSJ jhu slhk av jspupjhssf zpnupmpjhua kpmmlylujlz pu ylzbsaz huk aolylmvyl pujvyylja kvzl hkqbzatluaz. Hkqbzatlua av aol ahynla aolyhwlbapj kvzl yhunl zovbsk il thkl dpao ruvdslknl vm aol hzzhf bzlk huk jvyylzwvukpun ylmlylujl yhunl.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl aolyhwf mvy rpkulf ayhuzwshua pu hkbsaz (Vjavily 2017)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whaplua vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly zpyvsptbz.</w>   <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av hcvpk lejlzzpcl lewvzbyl av BC spnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; huhltph; hyaoyhsnph; hzjpalz; jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz tlsspabz; kphyyovlh; kfzspwpkhltph; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; mlcly; ohltvsfapj byhltpj zfukyvtl; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; olhspun ptwhpylk; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; slbjvwluph; sftwohapj clzzls kpzvyklyz; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; uhbzlh; ulvwshztz; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; vzalvuljyvzpz; vchyphu jfza; whpu; whujylhapapz; wlypjhykphs lmmbzpvu; wyvalpubyph; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlwzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zavthapapz; ahjofjhykph; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; mvjhs zlntluahs nsvtlybsvzjslyvzpz; olwhapj mhpsbyl; ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; whujfavwluph; wvza ayhuzwshua sftwovwyvspmlyhapcl kpzvykly</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (WYLZ)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
